item.title: 【Introductions & Farewells】Hi all! Hello! Hallo!
item.description:
Hi all,

Nice to meet you! My name is Evert! Evert is a Dutch and Swedish short form of the Germanic masculine name "Everhard" (alternative Eberhard). It is also used as surname. I'm a huge music collector. I own more then 400+ physical albums and a lot of digital music. Currently I am busy to catalogue (?) my music. I use a program for it. In that program you can add several information such as release date, music company, record studio etc. But also composers, writers and so on.
Very addictive program. And you can play your music directly from out of that program in, for example, Apple Music.

Back in the days (the 80's, 90's etc.) when there was no internet, we had Music Stores where I every Saturday went to listen to new albums and I pre-ordered import CD's and Maxi CD Singles. That was my excuse to go to that music store on the next Saturday LOL!
That expanded my collection with, sometimes, five of the same cd singles but it slightly was different cause there was an extra remix or number on it.

Here is a print screen of my collections program for you to share



I recently started again with this program and I know have catalogued 572 albums, singles etc.
I have a lot more to do!
Oh, and that program is called collectorz.
You find it here: https://collectorz.com/
Perhaps you already know it but it is a Dutch program and very populair because you also can download the same program for movies, comics and books.

If you are looking for specific music let me know I have a lot if iTunes (Apple Music) Albums ready to share.
And, if I made some grammar or spelling mistakes, let me know. I am not a native English speaker

Happy collecting!

Best wishes Evert
item.author: EvertNL
